Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created 28.06.2001
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
28.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended numeric/alpha scan for invoice number
alpha 20
16.07.2009 SH SCR14739 Changed update UFB544.PI.RemoveLeadingZeros=TRUE only
if PI.CLNTINVNO_NUMERIC = Y, else = FALSE
30.09.2008 SH SCR14011 Added UFB544.PI.RemoveLeadingZeros=TRUE
03.11.2006 SH SCR12065 Removed test to set all output parameters = 0 if more
than 10 invoice numbers were extratced
13.09.2006 SH SCR11871 Added GSET_HUSR_ID (GSET_ID=220), used in alphanumeric
scan to skip possible char in new variable to be used as separators between
invoice numbers
28.08.2006 SH SCR11772 Removed special part to extract invoice numbers if
GNRL_CODE = NL
18.07.2006 JJ SCR11596 changed v.Text for BANK_CONCATENATEALLDESC=N (non PL)
23.06.2006 AK SCR11494 changed in "numeriec scan" in the update of V.OK
02.06.2006 JJ SCR11259 changed v.Text for BANK_CONCATENATEALLDESC=N (non PL)
23.05.2006 AK SCR11259 add v.TEXTcondition based on BANK_CONCATENATEALLDESC
15.12.2005 SH SCR9785 Added part to remove leading zeros after truncation
of invoice numbers (see --> NL part)
01.07.2005 SH SCR8630 All PO.INVOIVENUMBERS will be truncated in case of
GNRL_CODE = N' from left to right that the numbers are max. 6 chars long
24.11.2003 SH SCR4832 Replaced UFB566 by UFB544, see SCR for details
21.11.2003 SH SCR4832 (see SCR for more details)
1. If GNRL_CODE = 'PL' the BDPD_DESCRIPTIONS will be concatinated with
spaces between the diff. BDPD rows
2. Fixed some bugs in task "Alphanumeric scan" and renamed some virtuals
and added remarks to make the task more readable
3. Implemented the call to UFB566 to remove leading zeros form extracted
invoice numbers
//07-10-2003 JP SCR #4414 submitter note: remove deletion, implement deletion of
leading zeros
//25-09-2003 JP SCR #4414 change length for "V.Non_Separator_String" to 63.
26.08.2003 SH SCR4170 Reduced selection of BDPD rows with BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE
- = 2 and changed the CND for the conactination of BDPD_DESCRIPTION, see SCR for
- details
15.07.2002 SH Removed '-' from 'v.Numberstring2' because '-' is a
-separator between invoicenumbers --> See task "Numeric scan"
TEXT = 800
-- Reset output parameters
// Test if there are duplicates
-- remove leading zeros (0) from extracted invoice numbes
-- Prepare V.TEXT from BDPD or CHQE
-- Start scanning ...
-- In case of GNRL_CODE<>'PL' the BDPD rows will be concatinated without
-- spaces between the diff. rows
Concatenate all desc = Y no spaces between trimmed BDP_DESCRIPTIONS
Concatenate all desc = N add spaces between trimmed BDP_DESCRIPTIONS
-- In case of GNRL_CODE='PL' the BDPD rows will be concatinated with
-- spaces between the diff. rows
// In case of a DTAUS file we do not trim the blanks (Normaly DTAUS is not a
// PL format, but for testing purposes the special handling for DTAUS will be
// also performed if GNRL_CODE='PL', requested by JDO 21.11.2003,
// because we try to use only this version in the future for all countries if
// it's possible, means the hole BLOCK where GNRL_CODE='PL')
Position is a number
And position is last position of string
Position is not a number, but last position was a number
-- GSET_HUSR_ID (GSET_ID=220) maybe included some characters which are used
inside an invoice number as a separator, f.e 2007/123 and not as separators
between invoice numbers
-- Remove possible blancs
-- Check if there a numeric value exists, then it's an invoice number, also
-- if there exists only one numeric value
-- An non possible value was detected or the last char was reached ...
... then remove last char (=separator char) from extraced incvoice number,
if extracted separator char not = ' ' and not the last char in V.TEXT
... and move the extracted invoice number (only first 20 chars) to the output
parameter, but only if there was a numeric value was detected for the
extracted string
... and add 1 to V.l, indicates the next invoice number which has to be written
to the output parameters
-- Reset virtuals
